Module ICS3U7FinalProject
Package game

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
game.GameState
Direct Known Subclasses:
Level1State, Level2State, Level3State, MenuState
public abstract class GameState extends Object
GameState is an abstract class that the other game states of the game can use
Author:
Ian Tang
